description:
Yugi is trapped inside the Duel Dome, and the only way to escape is by defeating the Duel Computer – a calculating contraption programmed with the skills of the world’s top duelists!  Since the Duel Computer has access to thousands of cards to create a devastating deck, how can Yugi win when he’s forced to use an amateur deck that barely contains any spell or trap cards?
Source: crunchyroll
